main.name: Edison Vargas
main.bio: Proven expertise  as Backend Developer in implementing new features or new projects in technologies based on Mulesoft large companies from different fields, using traditional and  agile methodologies, always considering restrictions on time, cost, quality. Good experience as a Developer with advanced skills in programming, clean code, codemaintainability, cyclomaticn complexity, line of code, execution governors and limits,etc. Using the best practices.

work.title: Mulesoft Developer
work.description: The proyects Developed solutions on products of Salesforce, I solved problems of integration and Cloudhub for telecommunications customers in Argentina, I used Mulesoft an designed with API-led connectivity and TM-FORUM. I help to undestand a customer about Api led connectivity. I maked the task Software Design. I worked with JWT, policies, and SLAS in cloudhub. i worked on git  flow and methodologies agile development. I realized the configuration in salesforce optimized the flows in mulesoft. I worked with MUnit, CI, DI on gitlab. I worked on Visualizer on Cloudhub and Elastic Search APM. I realized the configuration in Anipoints platform.

work.title: Java Developer
work.description: The Project was software development that manges the business process in the customer portal using Java Web technologies (JSP, PORTLETS, Spring MVC integrations, OSGI) on the LIFERAY platform. This used best practices in API builder and desing for Reston This integrated process of security with JWT and OAuth, I have architecture that highly-performed. This Front-end is created from JSP, HTML5, JS, and JQUERY. We work with agile methodologies, maintain the product, perfom product review task, and refine the  quality of the code, experience with large.scale distributed architectures

work.title: Java Developer
work.description: The project was sotware Development that manges the business process in the product insurance for the Healthcare industry, this used JAVA WEB technologies (JSP, JSF PRIMEFACES, spring MVC integration, CD, CI) on the JEE platform, integration into a REST and SOA architecture is performed, We work with agile methodologies, maintain the product, perform product review tasks, and refine the quality of the code.

work.title: Java Developer
work.description: The proyect implemented with cloud technologies such as GCP, following standards and architecture for monoliths and microservices, working with technology tools, such as Compute Engine, Appengine, Kubernetes Egine, Dataflow, Bigquery, Container registry. The project developed software in portlets that manage the business process on the pensions company use JEE technologies (JSP, JSF, PORTLETS) on a LIFERAY platform, works with distributed, architectures, and SOAP, with MULE ESB being used for flow creation and orchestrate services.

skills.name: Libraries, Frameworks -Jquery, Mockito, JSF, Junit, Munit
